Checkout concluído com sucesso! Você rec: Checkout completed successfully! Stripe will email you as soon as the payment is confirmed.
O checkout foi cancelado e nenhuma cobra: Checkout was canceled and no charge was made.
Sua assinatura será encerrada ao final d: Your subscription will end at the close of the current cycle. You will retain access until then.
Set STRIPE_PRICE_ID in the .env file before starting checkout.
Set STRIPE_PRICE_ID in your .env file to enable checkout.
R$ :amount / mês • Stripe Billing com im: R$ :amount / month • Stripe Billing with automatic taxes and coupon support.
Inicie a assinatura para continuar usand: Start the subscription to keep using Booknotes.
Você possui acesso vitalício concedido p: You have lifetime access granted by the Booknotes team. No charges will be applied and every feature remains available.
Sua assinatura está ativa. A Stripe cuid: Your subscription is active. Stripe handles the monthly renewals automatically and you can cancel whenever you want.
Há um pagamento pendente. Atualize o mét: There is a pending payment. Update your payment method to avoid service interruption.
Você ainda não ativou a assinatura. Após: You haven't activated the subscription yet. After the trial, access will be blocked until the monthly plan is enabled.
Oferecemos 14 dias de uso gratuito para: We offer 14 days of free usage so you can validate whether Booknotes fits your study routine. After that period we will ask you to activate the subscription to keep access to your notebooks and annotated PDFs.
O plano mensal custa R$ :amount. A Strip: The monthly plan costs R$ :amount. Stripe calculates taxes automatically (ISS, IOF, and local taxes) and you will receive Portuguese invoices by email for each charge. Promotion codes can be applied directly on the payment screen.
Você pode cancelar quando quiser. Caso c: You can cancel anytime. If you cancel, access remains available until the end of the already paid cycle and nothing else will be charged. Your data stays preserved in case you return.
Em caso de dúvidas sobre cobrança ou nec: If you have billing questions or need customized invoices, reach us via the in-app support or email contato@booknotes.com.br.
A assinatura é necessária para continuar: A subscription is required to continue.
Sua assinatura precisa ser ativada para: Your subscription must be activated to keep using Booknotes.
